name: DocuLex
overview:
Established in 1996, DocuLex offers years of experience in the field of document management software development. DocuLex serves over 1000 customers with its award winning Archive Studio Content Management and Document Management Software Suite. Archive Studio is 100% secure, browser-based solution that is an easy to use, productive document management, workflow and email archiving solution for any business environment seeking secure Instant Document Access. Archive Studio is available as a server-based product or an on-demand cloud-based software as a service. The Archive Studio Content Management Software Suite of Products Enables: •Document Capture, Indexing and Retrieval •Collaboration •Email Archiving and Compliance •Knowledge Management •Customized Workflow and Records Retention Management •Management of all business content with one 100% browser based application •On premise server installation or Cloud software as a service

DocuLex is committed to our customers and partners. We provide innovative, proven solutions to ensure your success, and the tools you need to streamline business processes and increase revenue, through our award-winning Archive Studio Content Management Software Suite, our dedicated support staff and the best in professional services.
